thread.title: Ashutosh Gowarikar's next to be a modern take on 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'
thread.title_full: Ashutosh Gowarikar's next to be a modern take on 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'

author: Deccan
title: Ashutosh Gowarikar's next to be a modern take on 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 14, 2015, 11.04 am Mumbai: Ashutosh Gowarikar is busy shooting for his period film 'Mohenjo Daro', but he has already planned for his next venture. According to reports, Ashutosh's next will be a modern day take on the much loved fairy tale, 'Snow white and the Seven Dwarfs'. Though the cast needs to be zeroed down, Ashutosh is keen to begin work as soon as he completes shooting with Hrithik Roshan. The film should roll towards the end of 2016.
It will be interesting to see who he chooses as his fairest of-them-all leading lady and her Prince Charming. The casting is crucial as he needs to find the perfect fit for wicked stepmother and the seven dwarfs.
 Bollywood Ashutosh Gowarikar Also Read ‘This can’t be tolerated’ A lucky day with Dev Patel Court rejects prosecution plea asking Salman Khan to produce driving licence in hit-and-run case There is no stopping for Ranbir Kapoor
